title: Ping!
body: Riot should do something about PING! You know "The PING PING PING PING PING PING". A mute button or something. Like seriously Riot!!!!!

replies.body: what's even worse is that I've noticed that I have begun to use this ping spamming  method myself.  Making simple statements in chat aren't always effective, whereas making a huge annoying noise over and over again, at very least you know you've been heard.
yep people don't seem to take any advice said in chat to heart so unless you annoy them with pings nothing gets done.

and these get you the silent ping spammers, which ends up annoying me and saying in chat to stop pinging so much u only need 1 ping. and what's worse is when ur already doing whatever the heck they're pinging and they keep pinging anyways. Then you go screw it do the opposite just so they shut up. oh you want us to retreat even though we already are? oh you're gonna ping 10x? cool ur not stopping let's see what happens when I go in. Oh now you're talking and saying wtf didnt u see my ping? no i'm a blind deaf person playing video games on top of it all I just randomly stop retreating with my team for no apparent reason. oh you want to target the adc even though I already am and you have just stopped using your skills just to ping like an idiot? Ah you must mean let's target the tank that seems like what you want to do. then they start cursing at you and end up afking and you just type in chat  cool as long as the pings have stopped i'm fine with this.
lol, that's just someone using the pings wrong, totally different situation.
Of course the opposite of this is the feeder accounts which, must have some sort of programming which, if team tries to actually take an objective, start ping spam.
